iti75:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaññeva na dātā hoti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṁ annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
iti75:3.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo avuṭṭhikasamo hoti.
iti75:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ekaccānaṁ dātā hoti, ekaccānaṁ na dātā hoti samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṁ annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
iti75:4.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassī hoti.
iti75:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaṁva deti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṁ annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
iti75:5.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthābhivassī hoti.
iti75:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
iti75:11.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
